tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wonderfull doctor...she cares for us and politely speaks to us.she will first listen to our problem and then clearly explains the medical condition *** ****** **** *****
I visited doctor during my pregency...my entire pregency went very well...that is all because of dr sushmita....i can never forget her...and always be in touch with her....she will motivate us,suggests us and helps to clear all the health issues and gives lots more confidence.

During my labour ,although my parents and inlaws were insisting her to do c-section to me as I was not able to bear pain....she was very stubborn during that moment and helped in undergoing labour process and delivered a boy baby without any complications....she is very supportive 

Many of my colleagues as well with my reference visited her and after meeting her even they have the same feeling what i have.

All my friends had met her during pregnancy...all have undegone labour pains and delivered babies...


The pregency tenure visiting dr sushmita is very good and i used to recollect those memories then and now...fruitfull journey in my life

Unfriendly..visited her for high risk pregnancy as I had previous miscarriage issue and I was bleeding explained her previous case but she did not bother .also asked her if I need any supportive medicine but she only prescribed me ecosprin 75..my HCG was raising initially but within 4days got to see spotting agaim tried to reach her . texted her multiple times to get th appointment..but no response..no reply..then visited another doctor *** **** ** * ****** **** ***** ************ *** ******** *** ** ** ** **** **** ********* *** ************* ** *** **** *** ***** * ***** ************I won't recommend her to anyone..she must be very good..but extremely unfriendly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Tests,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I'm blessed to have Dr sushmita as my gynecologist, she is so friendly and she knows what a person needs according to there body, she was boon for my pregnancy, I glad to tell that I'm blessed with baby boy and it was normal delivery done by Dr sushmita, she keeps in contact by whatsapp if u need any suggestions r support. I would strongly recommend if ur planning for baby and not only that I know her from past 4 yrs, when I had UTI she treated me for that as well, I recommen her for any woman related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review: Dr. Sushmita has been an amazing support for our baby's birth. I have been visiting her since our planning stage, she guided us thoroughly through the process of pregnancy and childbirth. I am a person who is super scared of needles, have never imagined an operation before this! I had the smoothest C-section ever. And Dr. Sushmita is a true magician in the OT. She made me feel so comfortable in the OT. Ella was born in a wink and before I knew I was already stitched up and out of OT! Thank you so much Doctor. Things would have never been so smooth without you in this situation of a pandemic. Both Ella and I are happy and healthy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sushmitha was very calm and patient and answered all my questions during each of my consultations and also over messages. She made us feel comfortable and was very approachable. She made my pregnancy journey smooth and also pushed for vaginal delivery although the labor was long due to baby's weight and position.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Sushmita is very experienced and accurate in identifying the problem.  I have been trying for a baby for the last three years but had no luck after consulting with Dr. Sushmita I was diagnosed with PCOD and egg growth problems, after her treatment within 5 months I was positive and delivered a healthy baby. Thank you so much, mam.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Thank you Dr.  Sushmita mam, 
It is glad to mention a beautiful journey of pregnancy with you, that came out with a healthy baby boy by normal delivery.... The way you gave comfort, care and confidence were truly like we were experiencing homely happiness with our month wise progessing stages of pregnancy. Our curiosity and fear always ended with a smile having discussions with you as u always gave satisfactory time for that.
Mine pregnancy was not a complicated one but u helped me in all ways making me aware of 
A.  The conditions that I will be having in further weeks (like false contractions and true contractions)
B. The pain in back and legs.
C.  What should I add in my diet (while I got a little gestationl diabetes)
D. The way u give cute face expressions while listening to our problems, and while touching the belly baby and its position, heart beat is so nice. 
I would strongly recommend my dear ones to have u as their choice for their baby..





From the "FIRST TIME PARENTS\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hii all im Radha 
I had twin pregnancy where got aborted with 1 at 7weeks was under other doctor's care ... got to know about doctor Susmitha consulted her pregnancy was fine but was examined with placenta previa at 19weeks but dr advised for bed rest need not panic 
Later at 23weeks I had heavy bleeding managed going to hospital, immediately dey stopped.  I was detected with PLACENTA ACCRETA . We were so panicked, dr was so supportive and confident everything will go fine ,really speaking it was challenging task for her ,but she so good enough to handle my situation, prolonged my pregnancy upto 37weeks without any complications  and delivery healthy baby boy . *** ** **** ************ * ***** ********** 
Thank you for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor.
Your kindness, sincere caring, and concern make everything better and are a great encouragement. Thank you so very much for taking care of me and being so skilled at what you do. Every day of my life will be better because of you. Thank you is not nearly enough
Doc was courteous and explained the diagnosis well. 5:50pm appointment time and doctor came at 6:40.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** *** **** *** ** ***** ** ********** she made my pregnancy phase very smooth, I was afraid of normal delivery, But with her guidance and support i had very calm labour and successful normal delivery. She helped me lot in every doubt i had during prenatal visits. She listens to problems very calmly n guides in every manner. I would definitely recommend her to my family and friends☺️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Wonderful experience with "Care health" clinic. Dr.Sushmitha is a great doctor, very friendly, professional and informative. She gives good suggestions on each visit as per the present health condition. Very rarely we can find such doctor. 
Appreciate the staff especially "Lavanya" for the help.
Finally, I am so glad I chose "Care health clinic" and would highly recommend to anyone.
I would like yo give 5 star out of 5. Thanks 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A big thanks to Dr. Sushmita (Cloudnine Hospital, HRBR Layout, Bangalore) i would strongly recommend all to meet Dr. Sushmita for any gynaecologist & obstetrician issues.. Dedicated doctor with lot of caring attitude. She treated me for the whole pregnancy period and done normal deliver..

Anyone who wants a dependable, friendly and informative doctor for any issues you are facing, Dr Sushmita K is the one you must consult.She eases all your worries, tensions,fears and doubts.She explains all the procedures so well. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************* **** * **** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Best decision i made for my pregnancy was to consult Dr.sushmitha. Doctor is very patient and friendly. *** **** *** ********* *********** ******* ** ***** *** suggest us to try home remedies first.I delivered normally coz of  the confidence doctor gave. She explains every single doubt of ours with a smile.In routine checkup I never felt nervous coz it was more like meeting my mentor. Thank you sushmita mam for being my support through my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife’s regular checkup’s are done by Sushmita doctor. She is very approachable and caring person. She clearly explains the progress of the pregnancy stages and also gives proper answer if we have any questions. Thanks for being so nice to the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Dr Sushmita in 4th month of pregnancy. There were some discrepancies in anamoly scan report. We visited multiple doctors before her  and mostly the diagnosis was not clear. Dr Sushmita studied our case and took us through all the procedures and ruled out all possibilities and and asked us to continue with pregnancy. She has been a blessing to us and God sent Angel :). She responds to each our queries with lots of patience and genuinely takes care of her patients . Apparently she is also specialized in high risk pregnancy and infertility case. I can't recommend her enough. Thank you Dr !! You will be remembered for life time !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was 38 weeks pregnant when I consulted Dr Sushmita. I needed some clarity about a few pregnancy related aspects and I consulted Dr Sushmita through a video call to get some guidance. My issue:Since the doc I was consulting for my pregnancy was kind of pushing me to undergo a c-section, though I was feeling it was "medically unnecessary", since I had no serious health issues. So I needed somebody to guide me after listening to my case properly.Hence I connected with Dr Sushmita and she was amazing at answering all my questions with great level of patience.  After listening to my case history she told me that I need not even think of a C section and she also gave me mental support which was very much essential at that point.She is very knowledgeable and friendly. I can't put through words how relieved I was after talking to her and I must say, I was able to make an informed decision after talking to her. Thank a ton Dr Sushmita!

review: I had visited the doctor for the first time. She was very soft, friendly and courageous. I had to fear due to my gynaec problem. But she read the history from my previous reports and suggested not to worry as it was normal and nothing so serious to think about. She explained in detail the reason for my bulky uterus and suggested to do only one scan and nothing more. I would recommend ladies nearby to consult Dr. Sushmitha K.
